patient_snapshot.text: Autopsy - Asphyxia due to ligature strangulation.

key_problems.text: Asphyxia due to ligature strangulation (Ligature B).
Post-mortem ligature mark on the neck.

pertinent_history.text: Victim is a normally developed white female measuring 67 inches and weighing 118 pounds, and appearing generally consistent with the stated age of twenty-six years.
Victim had not given birth and was not pregnant at the time of death.

objective_findings.text: Victim is wearing a white sleeveless turtleneck shirt and navy blue sweatpants.
Ligature A on the neck below the mandible.
Ligature B penetrates the skin and subdermal tissues of the neck.
Fractured hyoid bone, thyroid, and cricoid cartilages.
